Dear All,

Please find attached the delivery confirmation for the E-CART items received on 20/06/23.

I have also included a photo report of the two sofa crates. The crates have been placed in their designated positions within the Ground Floor Formal Lounge and have been left sealed to keep the items clean and dust-free.

chunks.text:
I have also included a photo report of the two sofa crates. The crates have been placed in their designated positions within the Ground Floor Formal Lounge and have been left sealed to keep the items clean and dust-free.

To further protect the marble flooring, I will be bringing cushioned floor mats to place beneath the timber crates. This will help prevent any potential scratches should the crates need to be repositioned.

Wishing you a pleasant day.

Best regards,
Linton
